name: Attegia: Druid's Hut 2017
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

In this VR experience, become a fantastic druid. Grow to a gigantic height or shrink to a minuscule size in order to find different ingredients within your hut. Mix them together, and make all kinds of crazy potions! Will you be able to craft the ultimate potion?

Platform : PC + HTC VIVE / Engine : Unreal Engine 
Number of players : 1

Producer : Hugo LEFEVRE
Game Design : Clément FITOUSSI, Pierre VANDERMAESEN
Game Art : Mélanie ROUX, Yani BELDJAOUDENE, Harmonie DUQUESNE
Game Programming : Julien FALCIONI, Stéphane RAMPIN
Music & Sound Design : Lou-Angel BOURDEAUX
